content: Hello everyone,We are excited to announce the launch of Valireum, a tactical team-based shooter game built on the Polygon blockchain. In Valireum, players can earn valuable cryptocurrency rewards by completing missions and winning matches.One of the unique features of Valireum is the ability for players to buy and sell in-game items and skins on the marketplace using cryptocurrency. This allows for a truly decentralized and player-driven economy within the game.Valireum also offers the option for players to host their own matches and earn cryptocurrency rewards for doing so. This allows players to participate in the network as node operators and be part of the game.For players who prefer a more casual experience, Valireum is also free to play. While certain in-game items and skins can be purchased with fiat or cryptocurrency, the core gameplay and features of the game are available to all players at no cost.Valireum also offers a wide range of customization options, allowing players to fully personalize their characters and weapons to fit their playstyle. Whether you prefer long-range sniping or close-quarters combat, Valireum has something for everyone.We believe that this combination of hosting and earning opportunities, along with the option to play for free, will make Valireum accessible and enjoyable for players of all skill levels and interests. We hope to see you on the battlefield soon!The game is currently in pre-alpha, but we will be launching it on multiple platforms in the near future. If you're interested in trying out Valireum and earning cryptocurrency rewards while playing, be sure to sign up for the pre-alpha at https://form.typeform.com/to/MBYqm2sc We can't wait for you to join us in the world of Valireum and experience the thrill of competitive shooter gameplay combined with the power of cryptocurrency.Official Links:https://www.valireum.nethttps://twitter.com/valireumhttps://www.youtube.com/@valireumhttps://t.me/ValireumDiscord -- Soon(Looking for manager)Thank you for your support,Valireum team
